segments.text: It ’ s so sad . They had been together for only two months . Do you know what the matter was ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mary said Jack was cheating on her . Jack was seeing a girl from his hometown . One day , May saw them holding hands and ended the relationship immediately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I ’ m very surprised . He doesn ’ t look like a guy who ’ d ever do that sort of thing , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , he doesn ’ t . Anyway , she found out that he had been two-timing her for a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe it is for the best . They are not suitable for each other because they have nothing in common and are completely different people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He is an extrovert while she is an introvert . He likes parties while she hates them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Poor Mary ! She really liked him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anyway , she was right to end things and she deserves better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think they ’ ll get back together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don ’ t think so . I know Mary . Once she makes a decision , she won ’ t change her mind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope she ’ ll recover soon .
segments.speaker: S1
